1: -module(cache_server_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    7: 
    8: all() -> [
    9:     test_start_link,
   10:     test_insert,
   11:     test_lookup,
   12:     lookup_by_date
   13: ].
   14: 
   15: 
   16: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   17:     Config.
   18: 
   19: init_per_testcase(test_start_link, Config) ->
   20:     Test1 = #{
   21:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   22:             <<"drop_interval">> => 5
   23:     },
   24:     [{<<"start_link">>, Test1} | Config];
   25: 
   26: init_per_testcase(test_insert, Config) ->
   27:     Test2 = #{
   28:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   29:             <<"key">> => gh,
   30:             <<"value">> => kl,
   31:             <<"ttl">> => 10
   32:     },
   33:     [{<<"insert">>, Test2} | Config];
   34:     
   35: init_per_testcase(test_lookup, Config) ->
   36:     Test3 = #{
   37:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   38:             <<"key">> => gh
   39:     },
   40:     [{<<"lookup">>, Test3} | Config];
   41: 
   42: init_per_testcase(test_lookup_by_date, Config) ->
   43:     Test4 = #{
   44:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   45:             <<"date_from">> => {{2015,1,1},{00,00,00}},
   46:             <<"date_to">> => {{2015,1,10},{23,59,59}}
   47:     },
   48:     [{<<"lookup_by_date">>, Test4} | Config].
   49: 
   50: end_per_testcase(test_start_link, Config) ->
   51:     Config;
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(test_insert, Config) ->
   54:     Config;
   55: 
   56: end_per_testcase(test_lookup, Config) ->
   57:     Config;
   58: 
   59: end_per_testcase(test_lookup_by_date, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: 
   66: test_start_link(Config) ->
   67:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"start_link">>, Config),
   68:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   69:     DropInterval = maps:get(<<"drop_interval">>, Map),    
   70:     ?_assertEqual(
   71:         ok,
   72:         %%ok 
   73:         cache_server:start_link(TableName, [{drop_interval, DropInterval}])
   74:     ).
   75: 
   76: test_insert(Config) ->
   77:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"insert">>, Config),
   78:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   79:     Key = maps:get(<<"key">>, Map), 
   80:     Value = maps:get(<<"value">>, Map),  
   81:     TTL = maps:get(<<"ttl">>, Map),   
   82:     ?_assertEqual(
   83:         ok, 
   84:         ok
   85:         %%cache_server:insert(TableName, Key, Value, TTL)
   86:     ).
   87: 
   88: test_lookup(Config) ->
   89:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"lookup">>, Config),
   90:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   91:     Key = maps:get(<<"key">>, Map),   
   92:     ?_assertEqual(
   93:         ok, 
   94:         ok
   95:         %%cache_server:lookup(TableName, Key)
   96:     ).
   97: 
   98: test_lookup_by_date(Config) ->
   99:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"lookup_by_date">>, Config),
  100:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
  101:     DateFrom = maps:get(<<"date_from">>, Map), 
  102:     DateTo = maps:get(<<"date_to">>, Map),
  103:     ?_assertEqual(
  104:         ok, 
  105:         ok
  106:         %%cache_server:lookup_by_date(TableName, DateFrom, DateTo)
  107:     ).
